# logtail_warehouse_source_group (Resource)

This resource allows you to create, modify, and delete your Warehouse source groups. For more information about the Warehouse API check https://betterstack.com/docs/warehouse/api/source-groups/create/



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the warehouse source group. Can contain letters, numbers, spaces, and special characters.

### Optional

- `sort_index` (Number) The sort index of this warehouse source group.
- `team_name` (String) Used to specify the team the resource should be created in when using global tokens.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The time when this warehouse source group was created.
- `id` (String) The ID of this warehouse source group.
- `updated_at` (String) The time when this warehouse source group was updated.
